markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Gahlepod (Juvenile Brughadatch)](/Monsters.aspx?ID=527)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The youngest brughadatches resemble overlarge tadpoles about 2 feet long.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fey](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 23

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 7">[Gahlepod](/Monsters.aspx?ID=527)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Amphibious" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=207" />
<trait label="Fey" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=69" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #154: Siege of the Dinosaurs](/Sources.aspx?ID=31) pg. 78</row>

**Perception** +13; darkvision, scent (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10); (can't speak any languages)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +17, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +14

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +6

**Con** +4

**Int** -4

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 24 

**Fort** +17 

**Ref** +19 

**Will** +14 

</row>

**HP** 140

**Weaknesses**
cold iron 5

**Churning Frenzy** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** The gahlepod becomes adjacent to at least one other gahlepod; **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** The gahlepod is spurred into a frenzy by the others. For the rest of the round, their jaws Strike deals 1d6 persistent bleed damage in addition to the listed damage.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 10 feet, swim 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +17,
**Damage** 2d8+7 piercing

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-123" />
name: Gahlepod
